title: Cheats crispy chicken Caesar salad
ingredients: ['1 good handful breadcrumbs', '1 large pinch dried oregano', '1 pinch Cayenne pepper', '1 large chicken breast fillet, sliced into strips', '1 egg, beaten', 'oil as needed', '1 bag Caesar salad kit (see note below)', '1/4 cucumber, sliced', '1/2 red onion, sliced in half rings']
